title: Home sweet home
creator_credit: Film Australia, Suzanne Baker and Philip Robertson
brief_description: Shows the organisation and effort required to reconstruct Darwin after it had been destroyed by Cyclone Tracy on Christmas Day, 1974. Illustrates the social impact of the cyclone.
creator_credit_for_label: Film Australia, Suzanne Baker and Philip Robertson
